title: 盔甲架如何改变朝向
author: AnDanJune_
txt_content: 就是说这个盔甲架默认生成朝南，我想朝东，如何解决，用summon

replies.author: llc1
replies.txt_content:
tp的：/tp @e[type=armor_stand] ~ ~ ~ 左右朝向  上下朝向
summon的：/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~1 ~ {ShowArms:1,Rotation:[角度f]}

replies.author: AnDanJune_
replies.txt_content:
llc1 发表于 2020-4-15 15:31
tp的：/tp @e[type=armor_stand] ~ ~ ~ 左右朝向  上下朝向
summon的：/summon minecraft:armor_stand ~ ~1 ...
谢谢
